The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits great, others mention it runs a bit large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My DIY Handmaid Halloween Costume!
items.body: I purchased this ANRABESS Womenâ€™s Long Sleeve Maxi Dress as part of a DIY Handmaid Halloween outfit, and it worked out perfectly! The color, flow, and overall look were exactly what I needed to capture that classic Handmaidâ€™s Tale style â€” simple yet dramatic. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, not heavy or clingy, which made it great for wearing all night. Itâ€™s a loose-fitting maxi dress, so if you want it to be a little more form-fitting at the top, I definitely recommend sizing down. I went with my usual size at first but exchanged for one size smaller, and the fit was much better. Overall, Iâ€™m extremely happy with this purchase. Itâ€™s not just a great costume piece â€” itâ€™s also stylish enough to wear year-round with the right accessories. Highly recommend for both costume use and everyday wear! PS- it has POCKETS!!! Oh and just for sizing guide, Iâ€™m wearing a size M AND IM 5â€™2 180 pounds â¤ï¸ Read more
items.author: Janell Estrella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and modesty
items.body: I absolutely love this vibrant red dress! ðŸŒŸ The color is cheerful yet professional, which makes it perfect for brightening up my classroom. The fabric is soft and super comfortable to wear all day, and the fit is modest without feeling frumpy. As a teacher, I really appreciate how easy it is to move around in,itâ€™s polished enough for work but practical for busy days with students. Definitely one of my new favorite pieces! Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and comfortable!
items.body: Love this dress! Comfy, and can wear almost anywhere, even add accessories and cute shoes and wear it out to dinner! Flattering fit that doesn't cling and also has pockets. Read more
items.author: Carole L

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay basic.
items.body: Thin and soft. Runs a bit large. Doesn't wash well, little fabric balls start to appear. Good for an easy comfortable option esp when in a pinch. Read more
items.author: Jenn Dahlberg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfy
items.body: Super comfy. First true to size. Iâ€™m 5â€™5, 135 lbs with 34F bust. I purchased a medium and it fits perfect up top with flow at the bottom and not being too tight around the center of my body. I wear it with a cute boho belt and fall boots, or with a jean jacket, scrunched socks and my platform Nikeâ€™s. Great fall dress! I find it super comfortable, yet still flattering. Read more
items.author: Amanda raw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, comfortable elegance.
items.body: These dresses are great. They feel like wearing a soft T-shirt all day. They hang straight down, so theyâ€™re pretty forgiving, the only thing I would change is making the side â€œslitsâ€ less deep. They go up to about the knee. The material is very soft and it has stretch to it. It really feels like putting on your favorite Tshirt. Itâ€™s a nice comfortable weight, light, but not flimsy. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these dresses.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Leaf Printed, Floral Green White, Floral Pink, Multi Leaf, Floral Light Blue White, Sage Green, Black, Coffee, Floral Green Pink, Floral Blue Orange Pink, Floral Lily, Floral Lake Blue, Bright Red, Floral Blue White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
